title: Pack of 2 Laminated Cotton Dust Sheets for Decorating, Waterproof 12ft x 9ft Dust Sheets Twill Laminated Polythene Backed Reusable Paint Sheets for Furniture, Floor, Staircase and DIY Projects
features: Generous Size: There are two cotton drop cloths, each measuring a spacious 12ft x 9ft (3.6m x 2.7m), our dust sheets for painting provide ample coverage for a wide range of projects; Whether you're protecting your floors, stairs, furniture, or even large DIY workspaces, this cotton dust sheet has you covered

Laminated Polythene Backed: Our decorating sheets are made from high-quality cotton fabric that's been laminated with polythene on the back to provide dust and water protection; no more worrying about paint and other spillages as ground sheets keep your surfaces protected!

Reusable and Easy to Clean: Our painting sheets are not a one-time-use product but you can use it for multiple times; Simply wash it to remove any spills or stains, and it's ready for your next project; Get your hands on great reusable large dust sheets that that save you money in the long run

Multi-Purpose Use: Whether you're painting, renovating, or conducting DIY projects, our dust sheets for furniture has you covered; It's perfect for safeguarding your floors, stairs, furniture, and valuable belongings from dust, paint, debris, and more

Compact Storage: When not in use, fold or roll up the paint cover sheets for convenient storage; It's lightweight and easy to transport, making our heavy duty dust sheets a practical addition to your DIY accessories

Double Protection Cotton Side The soft cotton side gently protects your surfaces while absorbing dust and spills Polythene-Backed Side The laminated polythene side prevents any liquids from seeping through, providing extra protection Cotton & Polythene Combo The cotton and polythene combo keeps your surfaces safe and clean, preventing any leaks and dust from seeping through 12x9ft Wide Coverage Save your precious belongings during renovation How should I store the dust sheet when not in use? When not in use, fold or roll up the dust sheet for compact storage. It is lightweight and easy to transport. Will the polythene backing prevent paint from seeping through? Yes, the polythene backing provides excellent protection against paint and other spillages, so your surfaces remain clean. Can the cotton dust sheet be used to protect delicate surfaces? Yes, the soft cotton fabric is gentle on delicate surfaces while the polythene backing offers great protection against spills and debris. Are these cotton dust sheets reusable? Yes, these sheets are reusable. Simply wash them to remove any spills or stains, and they are ready for your next project. How do I clean the dust sheet after use? You can simply wash our cotton dust sheets in warm water using a high-quality soap or detergent to remove spills and stains.
